documents.document: Come work with me at @EHFNewZealand! Bringing visionary entrepreneurs to NZ with the new #GlobalImpactVisa https://t.co/jn0oCnWU0j
I'll be waxing lyrical with poetic storytelling at Speaking With Purpose in March, in #Wellington. #SWP17 Get tix!… https://t.co/W6StmdNIwt
Morena @Allbirds! What are your current shipping times? Arrive by end of week on Waiheke if ordered today?
It's not true at all. Africans Americans and Hispanics voted for him in much higher numbers than Romney or other re… https://t.co/KK64YjEPaz
Time for some pleasant distraction from the world. Yeaaaahh!! #AllTalkWithAnikaMoa #AnikaMoa https://t.co/KOfDVRjAbx
@four_seven Would have saved getting up at 6am right...
@JadRahme And no finger prints on your screen
very cool! I still get a little bit excited when I see Billie or any of the @HipOpCrew on the Waiheke ferry. Lookin… https://t.co/VsBA76wAfJ
A belated congratulations to you @justin_lester - Stoked that you're leading the helm for #Wellington for the next three years!
Rest easy Helen Kelly, you deserve it after serving NZ above and beyond the call of duty. Love to friends/family https://t.co/yuOGR1ajxy
Thanks @EmilyFatu! If only I was as good at Twittering as poeting... @JennyKayNZ @OSOSNZ
Hey @WLGAirport - are you seriously not allowing @Uber_NZ drivers to pickup from airport? So my Uber driver tells me #walkingOutTheGates
This makes me very happy. https://t.co/Dv4ruVpTuF
Uganda does worse than just imprison gays @RobertGlennieNZ - Question becomes where is balance between fighting the fight, and surviving?
I wrote an article on @Medium - Gay or Nay in Vietnam? What happens when Pride and Pragmatism collide? #travel #LGBT https://t.co/yrEcY6DeOe
I just published “Gay or Nay in Vietnam? When Pride and Pragmatism Collide” https://t.co/rgxA0Z95rU
In related news, PM John Key refusing to say that the ocean is wet. "I'm not sure, I haven't been swimming recently" https://t.co/0KxmHosOPg
Proud of our team! Finalists in the Green Gold category of Wellington @GoldAwards https://t.co/SRoArEFmVn
This is pure gold! Can't wait to see the video! https://t.co/5A8ssCgETT
On of her many talents... this is a great talk Melissa! https://t.co/ZygSiLKJBv
The part of you that is unresolved is the most powerful part of your story - Michael Margolis @getstoried #storytelling
@where_is_anna filling up quickly but there's still a bit of room in back, sure you could sneak in quietly. #LLXX
"Our slightly tipsy idea has turned into a meaningful movement for kindness" @GoodBitchesBake, changing world one cake at a time #TEDxWelly
Is this how sitcoms build canned laughter?? Michael Armstongs social experiment at #TEDxWelly
Best quote of #TEDxWelly so far: "Work doesn't work, without play". @shondarhimes beaming in on video, on life's hum, on playing with kids.
Loving @charlesbabb's #TEDxWelly talk on diversity in video games. We need this so badly.
"If you look up for three weeks, it is very hard to remain closed" - such true words from @JavaDanceCo #TEDxWelly
Random picture, at the request of @sarb #TEDxWelly
This bus ride is either like a really exciting school field trip.... Or the start of a horror movie. #TEDxWelly
Where are these red double decker buses taking me?? I don't know... #TEDxWelly https://t.co/oASIrRdWWA
@DSelitskiy @kiwiconnectnz thank you for coming along! Great to have your voice today :)
@glbt4trump If you think Hilary has taken the community for granted, surely #FeelTheBern would be the logical alternative to support?
@glbt4trump I'm trying to understand how one minority group can support a person who so openly hates upon other minorities?
@glbt4trump Well absolutely she has taken us for granted. But why would you support someone who is so driven by hate and bigotry?
I can't decide if @glbt4trump is a joke Twitter account or not... Acceptance needs to be universal: race & religion as well as sexuality.
$4.5mil from NZ govt to Syria... meanwhile $450mil spent on outfitting EACH of our navy ships. @maidaborn - we can do so much more for Syria
@JessicaManins @msbananapeel Aaaw thanks you two :) #Wellington's not short of inspiring women!
Thanks @msbananapeel :) I had a great time performing it!
Thanks Jonny - Tickets still available for tonight, and just a handful left for tomorrow! https://t.co/LsZAuobir7 https://t.co/LzG7e0CLYP
Thx @where_is_anna I'll perform my wee heart out just for you! (And everyone else who participates in best Mon ever) https://t.co/4634Oowp6d
One down, three to go... Get in quick for tickets to #JaggedLittlePilgrimage tonight/tomorrow. Weds almost sold out! https://t.co/LsZAuobir7
What do you call an ironic situation that's not actually all that #ironic? Find out at my @NZFringe show! #Alanis https://t.co/LsZAuobir7
Tickets are SOLD OUT for opening night of #JaggedLittlePilgrimage, get in quick! #Alanis @BATS_Theatre @NZFringe https://t.co/LsZAuobir7
I'll be chatting with @RadioActivefm in 20 minutes about my upcoming @NZFringe show #JaggedLittlePilgrimage . Tune in on 88.6fm or online
Thanks Rogue & Vagabond team standing against gender-based violence. #ReturnOfKings not welcome in #Wellington https://t.co/tVCvid4UHl
@tedxwellington thanks, keep us posted please.
@justadandak WTF man. I watched the clock tick down 3,2,1... Click buy tickets.... Nope. Disappointing :(
@tedxwellington Ahhh... no. I think you'll find they're sold out. At least that's what Eventfinda is telling me. Sold out before on sale...?
Hey @justadandak Is Eventfinda telling me what I think Eventfinda is telling me??
Thanks @where_is_anna! Come see some #IronicShituations at my @NZFringe show @BATS_Theatre https://t.co/LsZAuobir7 https://t.co/9VkiQZQH8c
Related: Famed Australian white whale @Migaloo1 has a Twitter account. https://t.co/ha79UCyENY
I’ll be on Access Radio in twenty minutes talking about my upcoming @NZFringe show. Tune in online! @BATS_Theatre https://t.co/FFTpQvphb6
Win a double-pass to my Alanis Morissette-themed @NZFringe show, Jagged Little Pilgrimage! Details on this post... https://t.co/rMnM0eT8TE
@BATS_Theatre Come to the show, for a good ole dose of nostalgia! And questionable co-opting...
My @NZFringe show is getting close! Tix for #JaggedLittlePilgrimage avail at @BATS_Theatre. 14-17 Feb, 6.30pm. https://t.co/BW3M9OrvBn
Don't believe the hype #ThankGodForThis https://t.co/IfV1u6cLRu
@where_is_anna *Goes immediately there to find out if my name was one of those deleted...*
We're glad to have you on our shores @katetempest, can't wait to see you tonight. We should swap poems in back alley after ;)
@zenpeacekeeper A good antidote to it, which I read to balance the universe, is Ishmael by Daniel Quin.
@zenpeacekeeper I read this one too over the hols. It is indeed terrifying. I think of it every time I post on social media.
@fastercamels Good to know thanks. Comedy gigs have been hard work in past with spoken word. But open to it in future, I love Moon!
@fastercamels Hey Jonny, just saw this now. Not sure the show poems would fit comedy crowd, there is humour in there, but mixed with serious
So cool @Alanis taking over @guardian's advice column. I'm doing a show in @NZFringe on the advice I've taken from JLP over past 20 years :)
@Alanis Yes! - more feminine, valuing balance. @ceisenstein would be a great podcast guest to dive deep on this. #ConversationWithAlanis
@gerardoperry @Alanis How can you possibly separate the two? Music without authenticity is killing music industry. #ConversationWithAlanis
@Alanis How can we encourage vulnerability and real-ness into business lives? Some workplaces more open than others #ConversationWithAlanis
@Alanis How can we encourage vulnerability and real-ness into business lives? Some workplaces more open than others #ConversationsWithAlanis
Great night out with @where_is_anna @SianSimpson @SavIsSavvy and @ashalhashim last night! @Silicon_Val even made a star appearance.
I am so freakin' stoked for #Canada today. Finally the topple of the ice-blue-baby-eyed-killer-of-all-things-good. #Trudeau
#WhyWellington? Because pretty flowers grow out of the footpath by @embassytheatre #Wellington #GreenCity http://t.co/gFacI6FsyB
@BountingNathan @Alanis @iTunesPodcasts I think we can safely award a giant #Fail on trying not to sound rude there.
Thanks @JessicaManins! There's always room for more insights. Love to hear your highlights from the day!
@JessicaManins @nataliaalbert @where_is_anna @KristenLunman Yes! I'll be there with bells on. Or feathers. Or something. #IdiomProblems
@nataliaalbert @JessicaManins @where_is_anna @KristenLunman I could do Monday or Weds next week, but other days no good. Love this idea!
That moment when @B_Faumuina retweets your @Idealog article. Yep, that just happened. Kia ora Queen B!
woohoo! I made my publishing debut on @idealogmag on failure, assumptions & ethics in #lean #startup-land. http://t.co/KTCuzncs1h
Who's been thinking about joining @Uber in NZ? Hit me up for free ride codes! Value reduces after 30 Oct from $25 to $10, now is the time!
And also "Flight to the Next World" by Yakush Project @NorthwardsDS. Incredible tune, next-world design material. #DesignersPlaylist
If story designers count too @NorthwardsDS, I'm suggesting any uplifting progressive house #DesignersPlaylist.
Anything by @rhiansheehan is amazing for deep concentration esp #StoriesFromElsewhere @PalairetNathan @NorthwardsDS #DesignersPlaylist
@Justin_Wilcox @lightyouonfire Thx for taking on board my concerns today. As I said, difference btwn sharing w 1 person vs 150 is key.
@cwodtke @Justin_Wilcox Thx I plan to. But not within next hour or 2. cool down period necessary. Generally love the live startup build idea
@cwodtke @Justin_Wilcox As far as we know he wrote the (very unclear) Customer Discovery Ninja request in front of us. #supercharge #lean15
@EdNZ Yeah, I'm not too sure eh? Where's the line?
Anyone interested in an #ethics discussion about that phone call @justin_wilcox just conducted? #Supercharge #Lean15 #UnsureAboutThat
So we did @nataliaalbert! Huge thankyous to @kcolbin and @TEDxChCh for providing the space to connect. Was also start of new career for me!
I am so sad to be missing #TEDxChCh today! @nataliaalbert @TEDChCh :( Hope ya'll are having an incredible day!
@obmmusic Was awesome. Quite the lesson in Aussie hip hop as well!
Just finished #HereComeTheDogs today @obmmusic - Brilliant story! so great to read real, raw stuff from this end of the world.
@where_is_anna Don't we all...? Except @_jjw_ - He wants a goat. The world wants ponies and Jackson wants a goat. Go figure.
@where_is_anna "You said there would be a pony. Where the #*&$ is my pony??"
@rowsell (FYI - Al's Diner on Upper Queen Street is the only place I know in NZ that serves caesars, if you've caught the bug)
@rowsell Tomato and clam make a pretty good combo, don't you think? Bacon is the added bonus!
@builtinwgtn @kiwiconnectnz @extraord_tales @tashmahal Thanks! Tash pulled off something pretty extraordinary.
@nataliaalbert Sure... why not :) Two tweets for the price of one...
@sustaincoasts Ban them like California. Or make them prohibitively expensive. It won't take long for people to start bringing their own
@nataliaalbert @kiwiconnectnz Thanks lady! My name is without a "k" though ;) Loving the new photoshoot pics!
@Nevarware If you're an engineer then you know better than anyone that characters matter.
@WaterPuppetry Yep life is great. Have jumped from water to social enterprise / tech startup space. Loving it ! nice to be back in NZ :)
@WaterPuppetry Hey! Long time no see, hope you're still repping Canadian water leaders, doing the good stuff :)
